programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d -M0 ;;;RT audio I/O, midi in ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o statevar.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 2
instr 1
kenv linseg 0,0.1,1, p3-0.2,1, 0.1, 0 asig buzz 16000*kenv, 100, 100, 1 kf expseg 100, p3/2, 5000, p3/2, 1000 ahp,alp,abp,abr statevar asig, kf, 200 outs alp,ahp ; lowpass left, highpass right
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> ; Table #1, a sine wave. f 1 0 16384 10 1
i1 0 2
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
